description.value:
You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.

You can grant the Hit Points you would regain from @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Communal Healing]{Communal Healing} to any one creature within the range of your heal spell instead of yourself. You can also use Communal Healing when you target only yourself with a heal spell, though if you do, you must grant the additional healing to someone other than yourself.
